website_summaries.verdict: Though it has some user-friendly features and isn't very expensive, it may disappoint users who want an umbrella that will weather the wind.
pros: Garners praise for offering 50 UPF sun protection and adjustable telescopic/tilt pole for a mid-range price
Metal parts are protected from the sun with undercoating
Comes with bag and sand anchor
cons: Not very stable when the wind is blowing
Issues with the ribs breaking in windy conditions

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk, steer clear as other buyers warned...
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this purchase. Bought it Aug. 1, took it to the beach and used it two consecutive days in August 2017. As I put it away at home, I noted that the pole has about 6 dents in it where the top part of the umbrella shifted in the bottom part of the pole due to very light winds, which deformed the poorly-made, thin-walled pole. I'm calling Amazon about a refund. this is not acceptable. I would NOT buy a Tommy Bahama umbrella again. I should have listened more to the negative reviews from owners who said the company didn't make products today with the same quality it did in the past. Find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Loved at first, then . . .
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product two stars because the sand anchor is longer than most and works well. Other than that, after two summers, I can't recommend. The first summer, the mechanism to put down the umbrella to fit in the carry case jammed. The second summer, the same mechanism fell completely apart - disintegrated. The umbrella randomly went into tilt position. I tried to straight it and then pieces flew everywhere. I guess for the price, I did get two summers out of it - sortof - since the daily rental rate for umbrellas at the beach is $40 and up. By the way, since I ordered it two years ago, Amazon won't do anything.
customer_reviews.author: A Friend of Bill

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at the beach
customer_reviews.text: East setup when using on the beach. Carry bag is great to have when lugging to the beach from the condo. When placing into the sand, I was a little cautious with the plastic auger when twisting into the sand. Winds were light, so I can't say how it would hold up under higher winds on the beach. Good product for the price when comparing to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: JASON

customer_reviews.title: I want a refund!
customer_reviews.text: I live in hawaii , and this umbrella is more trouble and useless then it is to just bear the sun. It flips constantly, and no matter how deep ypu drill it in, it will lean over. The swivel option just makes the umbrella do circles around the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken McNugget

customer_reviews.title: Not for strong beach winds
customer_reviews.text: I'm finishing up my Outer Banks vacations. This umbrella was a big sisppoimtment. We anchored all the atl to the red Mary as indicated and still with gusty ocean winds it wasn't stable. It fell a couple of times, before we put away. Once it flipped inside out! It looks nice and would be great away from the beach and by the pool without a lot of wind.
customer_reviews.author: Mapmaker11

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE / Huge/ Love this one!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last year for use at the beach (In Florida). Was hoping for a good quality, sturdy umbrella - it's more than I expected!! We are avid beach goers and have used this multiple times! (We have gone through several umbrellas in the past) I feel certain this one will last for a long while! It is very durable and VERY big! I love the anchor it comes with- it works very well even in windy days! It can be tilted in many different positions, covers a LOT of area AND packs up nice and neat and convenient in it's own carrying case! Now if I could only get my husband to stay longer at the beach! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Tina Dice

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Easy to Use.  Very Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Took two of these to the beach. There are absolutely wonderful. They are very light weight and with the strap that comes on the included carrying bag, it goes right over your shoulder for easy transport. In the sand these work very well. The base is easy get down into the sand and holds tight. We were at a couple of very windy beaches not too long ago and these stayed put. They are very well designed and very durable. The tilt in the umbrella is also a very nice feature that helps maximize the shade. Really a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Troesh

customer_reviews.title: tommy Bahamas is the best brand in the world
customer_reviews.text: Good umbrella for the beach, works very well and covers against the sun. Tommy Bahamas is the best brand to buy things for the beach. It is a lasting brand
customer_reviews.author: leidy yulieth correa pabon

customer_reviews.title: VERY pleased with the look and design
customer_reviews.text: VERY pleased with the look and design! Great price, and it comes with the corkscrew tip to make sure it's secure in the sand. There are even "handles" on the pole that you can grip to twist it down into the sand, then fold down the handles again when you're done. Folds up easily and comes with a carrying case. We got the red one and it's a true red, very festive and looks great on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: B.H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't blow away on the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for my son, whose previous umbrella broke while new in the wind. This has built in vents. He has used it once so far and was very satisfied with the performance and sand anchor.
customer_reviews.author: Serpentine

customer_reviews.title: Great beach umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: High quality umbrella. Durable! We had high winds on our trip but it survived unscathed!
customer_reviews.author: Chris J

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: In spite of some less than positive reviews I bought this umbrella for a week vacation at Myrtle Beach. You will be happy if you buy it. It augered into the sand very easily, never came close to lifting out of the sand in the wind, and did what it is supposed to do. It is lightweight, transports easily, and looks good. Others have noted the lightweight materials it is made from. Yes, it is lightweight and was designed that way. If you want an umbrella built like a tank, spend $500 and drag it in the sand to your spot. I expect to get a good number of vacations out of this purchase. Buy it. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Khof

customer_reviews.title: I
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the squiggly pole end that goes into the ground but its ok. I use it in my back yard to cover things I am working on that needs no sun shinning down on them.
customer_reviews.author: suz

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella pole does not fit in base pole!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this the end of last summer to use this summer. I took my brand new umbrella to the beach yesterday only to discover the umbrella pole is too wide and does not fit into the base pole!! I had read positive reviews for this product, but looking thru the reviews today, I see others have had this problem. Since I bought it 10 months ago, it is too late to return it. Very dissatisfied with this product as it is useless!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: This product works well I love going to the beach I use it to protect me from the suns Rays hold up it steady wind easy carry
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella. I've owned many varieties
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella. I've owned many varieties, and for the money, this one is definitely the best. The material is thicker than the cheap varieties, and the wind hole (top) is nice as well (although, a brisk breeze will still turn it inside out if the umbrella is positioned improperly with the wind). Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: bought one since we moved to Hawaii and spend a lot of time at the beach. It works great so ordered a second one which just came in today. found it better to have plenty of shade for the kids and myself when spending the whole day at the beach.Delivery was quick. Came in a day sooner that expected. It gets a bit breezy and it has yet to topple over like some of the other brands. Would definitely suggest this umbrella to friends and family. Must have for beach days!
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Stays put.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time on the beach. Held up well when the winds gusted some. Love the built in anchor that you just screw into the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Takemetothebeach

customer_reviews.title: Great beach umbrella; light, strong, and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: We took this umbrella with us on vacation this summer for a week at the beach. The umbrella performed perfectly. Easy to set up, easy to take down, it survived strong winds easily. One REALLY windy day, we had to close it to keep it from blowing away... but so did everything else on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin D Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, but twenty minutes of pain at first
customer_reviews.text: Only issue was trying to get the top part in the bottom part. Once it finally got in, getting it in after that was easy.
customer_reviews.author: bobsaysvoo

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure we would loved it but unfortunately it was broken. We would like to return it for one that isn’t broken please.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The foldout arms to help screw into the sand were great to have
customer_reviews.text: Used for a week in Destin FL with no issues. The foldout arms to help screw into the sand were great to have. We had one day where the wind was a bit much and the umbrella held its own. Our kids “beach shop” umbrella went flying and we had to run after it. My husband was impressed with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect. Otherwise
customer_reviews.text: In anything above very light winds, this needs to be set deeper in the sand than it is designed to be in order to avoid falling over or risking blowing away. For light-to-no wind days, it's perfect. Otherwise, bring a sturdier umbrella with a longer shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Kaeroku

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cost an arm and leg and works great for a beach day. It will have an issue with windy days as this is still a light weight umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: wuschnik

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, screws into ground or sand
customer_reviews.text: My model rc sailing group uses this umbrella for protection during the hot Arizona summers. Works great, can tilt to block the low morning sun.
customer_reviews.author: AZJOE

customer_reviews.title: This umbrella is perfect for the beach day
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is perfect for the beach day. Easy, quick set up (thanks to its twisted bottom) and is light weight to carry. It came in a well packed box, 4 stars cuz when I open from the box, the handle of the umbrella cover (carrier) came off, I have to hand stitches back on. No big deal. Better deal at BJ.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Levittowner

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Tested this at the beach, and it was perfect. - It deals with the wind pretty well with that vent at the top. I didn't have to worry about it at all. - The anchor is easy to use and works very well. - The handles used for inserting the anchor into the ground are made out of plastic, I fear that they might break in the future. Maybe not anytime soon. I should go back to the beach and do some more testing :D
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this umbrella. sturdy and easy to put up, take down, and bag. Love the new design to twist it into the sand.
customer_reviews.author: Deb B

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This looks great and is easy to use. We went from a 10' X 10' canopy, to a Coleman beach tent to this and couldn't be happier. Much easier to carry to the beach and put up. Still gives plenty of shade for two people.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D W

customer_reviews.title: Stretcher broke aft r 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella in May of 2015 and by December one of the stretchers was broken. I liked it because it's really light weight and easy to put up but it shouldn't break in 7 months. Amazon won't exchange it so now I'm dealing with the manufacturer. I'm going to try electrical tape on my he stretcher and see if that works.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lange

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Sun Protection,  and stays in place
customer_reviews.text: lightweight, good sun protection, and best of the built in “grabber” makes it a safe on the becah
customer_reviews.author: Peter Pace

customer_reviews.title: Great Shade
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella. I use it when I take my dog to the dog park and I just twist it into the dirt ground. The ground that I have been putting it in it very tough so the umbrella doesn't go completely in but it's understandable, probably does better in sand and soil. I still love it, lots of shade and very sturdy for being plastic. It is light weight and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: LadyPeach

customer_reviews.title: This is a great beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beach umbrella, it's lightweight at 6 pounds and the screw in base is awesome as well. If you take a look around you'll notice a lot of other people on the beach with these and once you use it you will know why. I debated between this one and another brand's umbrella that breaks into smaller pieces, but I'm glad I went with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Utah

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this umbrella. I used them (I bought 2) on the beach with moderate wind and at first wasn't sure how they would hold up. After about 5 minutes I jumped into the game of volleyball because I knew they weren't going anywhere. I especially like the tilt option. It allowed me to create more shade by tilting than to have to try to move the entire umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly C.

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great in moderate wind.
customer_reviews.text: We just bought this and spent a week just South of Myrtle Beach (Litchfield). The umbrella worked very will even up to a pretty good wind. If wind is very strong, we dug down in the sand several inches first, then screwed in the umbrella to the recommended line then packed the sand back around it. Once we did this it would remain sturdy all day. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P Kilbarger

customer_reviews.title: Buy the blue one, it’s the best quality
customer_reviews.text: The best one is this lineup is the dark blue / lighter blue staggered colors in ever other pane. Each of these is slightly different but that one is the highest quality and best build materials.
customer_reviews.author: Raptor Wear Products

customer_reviews.title: ... I own two Tommy Bahama beach chairs that I love. I ended up having to return the umbrella ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when I purchased this umbrella because I own two Tommy Bahama beach chairs that I love. I ended up having to return the umbrella because it had clearly been used by someone else. It was covered in sand when I took it out of the cloth carrying bag, so I can only assume someone else bought it, used it, and wasn't satisfied and returned it. I didn't want to take any changes with it, and immediately returned it. Bummer...
customer_reviews.author: Karen C.

customer_reviews.title: Good for casual days
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but it's for "light" to "moderate" winds and use. The auger and plastic handle seem more fragile than I would like and the canopy ribs do not seem as sturdy as other models I see on the beach. With care, and in regular use, it's a great and good looking product. Not for use on high wind days (> ~8mph gusts).
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Moyer III

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I got what I paid for. It does not fare well against some of the stiff breezes of the Outer Banks. The sand is also very loose and the shaft did not stay in place. It would work better on a more packed sand like Myrtle Beach. I saw an umbrella that had tie-downs with sand anchors that would have worked better or a heaver material.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up / take down and super lite to carry! High winds may be challenging but often the case with many umbrellas unless perhaps you go to heavy duty wood etc. Exactly what I was looking for in beach umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We used it a few times at the beach and everything worked great. We ended up returning umbrella because the pole ...
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella was just what we wanted. We used it a few times at the beach and everything worked great. We ended up returning umbrella because the pole would not stay secure in the upright position and would not straighten at the joint area. Overall the umbrella did great in the wind and was what we were looking for, but the difficulty with the pole made it very challenging to use.
customer_reviews.author: Twinmomsue

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FOR BEACH USE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I read some of reviews before purchasing, some said this umbrella did well in the wind...NOT SO! first day in use with mild steady wind, it turned inside out and bent 2 spines ( which were very thin!! Waste of $ even though it was on sale & a Tommy Bahama!! Very disappointing!! Sending it back!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Who ever inspected this didn't do a good job clearly as the umbrella bag strap is torn ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the product As-is. I was expecting a damaged box. Ad says product is inspected but may not come in original packing. Who ever inspected this didn't do a good job clearly as the umbrella bag strap is torn and cut. Returned for a other one. That one was in worse condition!
customer_reviews.author: Valgal

customer_reviews.title: Like other buyers said
customer_reviews.text: Big but not strong to hold wind. Like other buyers said...it won't hold winds at the beach. Also it is cheaper at costco for $20
customer_reviews.author: An average reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella! My sister and I went to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella! My sister and I went to the beach together and we both bought new equivalent umbrellas. It was a windy day and mine (the tommy Bahamas ) stayed put. We had to chase my sister 's umbrella (not a TB umbrella) down the beach 2 times.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: EASY to set up and works really well. When the wind was REALLY strong, it did eventually blow down, so we had to set it up again, but it was REALLY strong wind. Other days were not strong wind, and no issue at all having to set it up. We had to move it multiple times with the tide coming in, glad it's so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Bekah W.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this based on awesome reviews. I used it for the first time ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on awesome reviews. I used it for the first time at the beach. The locking mechanism didn't work. The umbrella kept sliding down. Also I found that it was not as sturdy as I would have liked. I moved up to the bigger umbrella I brought after 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: crazy8s

customer_reviews.title: Good quality beach shade
customer_reviews.text: You see the umbrellas everywhere nowadays. I think this one is a cut above. The red is very nice and it is sturdy. I use it at work sites and on the beach. Disassembles into two pieces that fit in a handy bag. One bad thing: Two weeks after it arrived, I saw if for fifteen dollars cheaper at Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: It was particularly windy a couple of the days and this umbrella held up just fine. It even inverted with one large gust of ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this on our vacation at Myrtel Beach. It was particularly windy a couple of the days and this umbrella held up just fine. It even inverted with one large gust of wind but easily went back to normal and was still usable with nothing broken. Great price for something that held up for a vacation and will probably not be used often, but will be great to have when we do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Mercedes of beach umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: Really great beach umbrella. It comes with a built-in anchor so it is super easy to screw it in to the sand. It withstands even the most strongest winds one can encounter at the beach during a typical day. The fabric is made of high-quality fibers and the swivel option is a great added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra & Tom

customer_reviews.title: Just try and hide from me now on the crowded ...
customer_reviews.text: Just try and hide from me now on the crowded beach!! I am hoping that this color will POP especially since I plan to attach some colorful ribbons to the ribs as we go to a very crowded beach on the Jersey shore. It is always such a chore just trying to find my family. Hopefully problem solved!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality in rain and snow. Sturdy and wind resistant. Second one I’ve bought.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Came Damaged. Call not returned!
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella cover came with what looked like several cigarette holes in it. Called customer service, left message, no call returned. Umbrella poles also had defects. Had to sand one to fit it in the other. So annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Ayers

customer_reviews.title: A lightweight and great looking umbrella
customer_reviews.text: A lightweight and great looking umbrella. Very easy to install. The anchor keeps it in place on a moderately windy day. My only complaint is that the anchor handles are made out of plastic and when you twist the anchor into sand, it feels like the more force you apply the higher is a chance for the handles to break.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliya Odesskaya

customer_reviews.title: My friend who went to the beach with me is getting one she liked it so much
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is so light weight. Anchor works well- my umbrella was steady in moderate wind while others had problems keeping theirs straight up. Live the tilting mechanism and the fact I can lock the umbrella as high or low as I want (which may be normal, but my last umbrella locked in at one height- I couldn't put it lower to the ground for more shade). My friend who went to the beach with me is getting one she liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Aluminum pole broke in light wind first time I used it. Wasn’t very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Study umbrella for the price
customer_reviews.text: We use this umbrella at the beach in Florida. Lots of wind, lots of sun, and a few fairskinned babies. Love that it screws into the sand for sturdiness and provides good coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice Umbrella, Anchor not so nice!
customer_reviews.text: Not loving the attached anchor as it seems to not grip the sand as much as the one I have for my other umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Lapent

customer_reviews.title: Great beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella - the size is perfect and the color is beautiful, and easy to spot on the beach! The setup was easy and I love the fact that it tilts and has a built in "auger" to anchor it into the sand. Next summer, will probably get a second one with some matching chairs!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Not once did I feel like this umbrella was truly going to get knocked down ...
customer_reviews.text: It held up under a steady, not particularly breezy (gusty) day. Not once did I feel like this umbrella was truly going to get knocked down or blown out of the ground. If you screw this into the sand and you can't pull it out as hard as you possibly can... the wind won't either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazor

customer_reviews.title: The King of Junk Umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: It feels more sturdy than the Walmart/convenience store junk, but it isn't "fine" quality. If your budget is $45 and you're going to buy junk anyway, I'd recommend this. Otherwise, you'll have to spend $100-$200 for a high quality canvas and wood umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected.
customer_reviews.text: We used this same umbrella while in Maui recently and loved it so came home as bd bought one for ourselves. It's very sturdy and held up against the tradewinds just fine. Plus we love the vibrant red color.
customer_reviews.author: lynne springer

customer_reviews.title: No one wants to give a Christmas gift that's dirty and ripped.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this purchase when I opened the box I found that the bag the umbrella was stored in was tattered and dirty. The carry strap of the umbrella bag was ripped off and there's no way now to store the umbrella, never mind carry it anywhere. Luckily the umbrella itself seems to be in good condition which is why I am giving this review one star. No one wants to give a Christmas gift that's dirty and ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Was afraid it was a fake being that the price was so low but this is the real deal,excellent quality...very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Wind blows it away if you follow instructions...
customer_reviews.text: If I follow the instructions for burying the pole in the sand, the wind always blows the umbrella away. I have to dig a big hole way deeper....and place rocks around the bottom of the hole before burying the umbrella...not until then it is stable...
customer_reviews.author: R S

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Held up great, even in strong gusts. Very impressed with the ease of folding up & carrying. I'm very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella - works really well in very windy conditions
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella - works really well in very windy conditions. Other families' umbrellas blew away, but ours stayed in place except for one very very strong gust of wind. Well worth the money. Very happy after 8 trips to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia S. Knopf

customer_reviews.title: As others have mentioned, the plastic flanges used to ...
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, the plastic flanges used to drive the screw into the dirt seem cheap and breakable, but they have not broken on me yet. Also, the plastic screw is starting to wear down a little, but the product still works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Spheres.108

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Used it at Fort Walton beach with moderate wind with no problems
customer_reviews.author: kimberly weiss

customer_reviews.title: Broke the second time we used it.
customer_reviews.text: Broke the second time we used it. Fiberglass spines pretty flimsy. Al's didn't hold up in moderate wind... every other umbrella at the beach did.
customer_reviews.author: SJH

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed at the quality of the pole which is flimsy ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella to the beach on a not so windy day, when I looked around the beach other umbrellas were not swaying as much as mine and I secured the umbrella in the sand to the red line indicated on the pole. I was disappointed at the quality of the pole which is flimsy at best. I would not recommend this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: My girl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Hit Lido beach on an extra windy day & it stood up to the pressure. Great sun coverage for two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful color and a nice big umbrella for the beach.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Beach Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made works pretty well. Alot of wind at Myrtle Beach holds up to most average windy days. We do put it down when it's really windy.
customer_reviews.author: GeoW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it and stronger than the last umbrella, but it cannot stand up to a strong wind.
customer_reviews.author: K. Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for a Beach Lover
customer_reviews.text: Very excited about this umbrella. Bought it along with the Tommy Bahama beach chairs as a gift for my father and he was so excited when he opened the box. Product in flawless condition, can't wait to use these this summer at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Colton

customer_reviews.title: High quality sun umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction, made of high quality materials and very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Javier Menendez

customer_reviews.title: I recieved a damaged umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I just moved to FL and couldn't wait to but my beach chair and umbrella! It took me a few weeks to purchase because as we all know moving is NOT cheap! Needless to say I was extremely disappointed when my umbrella showed up with multiple rips and my pole was bent!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee McTague

customer_reviews.title: Includes integrated sand anchor
customer_reviews.text: High quality and looks great. I didn't even realize it has a sand anchor built in.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Tire Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks of the umbrella but one pole fits down into the other without any kind of locking mechanism. Has one that looks like it should work but does absolutely nothing. This resulted in the umbrella coming out when it got windy.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: I especially like the fact that it has an actor system to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a last minute beach trip. It is well manufactured and withstood the wind at the beach. I especially like the fact that it has an actor system to help keep it put. I would definitely purchase this again and is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: We love this umbrella!! We took it to Pensacola last year and it was perfect for our vacation. It is easy to set up and take down. It also provides plenty of shade. It stayed in place even during some very windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Bluebird80

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: My Husband bought this for me to go with a chair I already have. It's a nice size umbrella which provides decent coverage at the beach. It tilts which is great throughout the day at the beach because you can adjust as the sun moves across the sky.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny O

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Okay beach umbrella. Does not really hold up to too much wind
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved this beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I loved this beach umbrella. I ordered two and they were very easy to set up. The only think I didn't like about it that if the wind is blowing you do have to hang on to the umbrella. But when I looked around so was everyone else with their umbrellas too. I do recommend these for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open--bright and cheery
customer_reviews.text: I use this umbrella in several different spots in my garden. I love the ease of operation and how nice the tilt is when the sun is at varying degrees of azimuth and altitude. The bright and cheery red encourages the tomatoes growing in my garden to compete with its lovely color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella just recived a damaged one
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive my umbrella I unboxed it and instantly notice something out of the ordinary. It appeared that the aluminum pole was bent and would not allow the umbrella to even open. I just want a one that's not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes at first, then let down.
customer_reviews.text: It held up well the first day, but very low wind. Second day at the beach was a different story. The plastic rods supporting the umbrella would bow in during wind gust, thus trying to slap you in the face. Then the next thing i noticed was the plastic clamp keeping the adjustable height rod in place slipped off the anchor road, and the umbrella tried to blow out from the anchor. People who had the sports-bella didnt have any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: first of all paid entirely to much for this umbrella with plastic parts; $43.98 . . Amazon you got me that time. It will not happen again. This would have been a fair price had the parts been metal.
customer_reviews.author: Randall B. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great beach umbrella that won't fly away in the wind!
customer_reviews.text: Anchors nicely in the sand and doesn't flip inside out in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Look no further
customer_reviews.text: This anchor system is top notch! Easy to set up and put away. Worth every penny. It stood up to some pretty strong winds.
customer_reviews.author: T. LESLIE

customer_reviews.title: GREAT beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: One season down and this umbrella is pretty great even with a bit of wind. Great value for the money. Inexpensive but well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Guerrera

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and easy to carry, but the handles to twist the umbrella into the ground are pretty flimsy, the feel like if with any type of pressure and they are going to snap off.
customer_reviews.author: R G

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to windy beach weather!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, holds up to windy weather. My husband loved the digger on the end of it, much easier to put up compared to our old, cheap one. This is also the best price I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey M.

customer_reviews.title: Good Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, good price, looks great! I cannot be on the beach without it!
customer_reviews.author: Reign

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bright red umbrella at the beach this summer! Was fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Susan G.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good quality beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality beach umbrella. The mechanism for screwing it in the sand is convenient but could be more sturdy. It did flap and wobble done during high winds but held up well in our beach trip.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpack

customer_reviews.title: Luv it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent in every way! Simply perfect! Luv it!! Very stable even in strong wind on LI beaches!! easy as can be to get out of bag and into the sand with screw anchor attached to the pole! esy and perfect! And a great price too and came within a few days!! Best beach thing I ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Kestler

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Holy heck this is a great umbrella. Bought it for Hilton Head and when it came I was surprised how large (but light) it was the first time I opened it. Held up great even with beach wind for five days. Make sure to point it at an angle against the wind so it doesn't flip. Anchored down in the sand fantastically and will definitely buy another for the next trip so we can set up multiple shade spots for the kids to play under. :D
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella, but be careful not to let the wind catch it, as the pool bends easily.
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella, but be careful not to let the wind catch it, as the pool bends easily. We made this mistake on our first use and now it's slightly warped at the bottom. It seems to work best if you don't tilt it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mogush

product_meta.title: Tommy Bahama Sand Anchor 7 feet Beach Umbrella With Tilt and Telescoping Pole- Red
product_meta.description: This 7 foot Tommy Bahama Beach Umbrella has an aluminum pole with fiberglass ribs. The Vent located on the top of the canopy increases its wind tolerance and gives the umbrella more stability in windy conditions. The Tilting Mechanism allows for easy adjusting to the moving sun. This beach umbrella features a silver lining for a UPF 50+ sun protection. The Tommy Bahama Beach Umbrella is comprised of a two-part 1 1/4 in. aluminum pole. The bottom pole is designed with a built in sand anchor for easy anchoring. Carrying Case Included!Telescopic Aluminum Pole . Fiberglass Ribs . Wind vent . Built in Sand Anchor . UPF 50+ Silver Lining. Carrying Case . Weight: 4.8 lbs . Tilting Mechanism.
feature_bullets: Special aluminium undercoating protects against the sun's harmful rays

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars438 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
